name: Abracademy (Lisa Fontaine)
description:
Game originally made in 2 days for the  Pot-au-Jeu 2.0 game jam

You are a student in sorcery,  and you are about to take the exams to get your diploma!

You will have to go through different tests, each one requiring a special metamorphosis!

Credits

Game Design & Programmation during the jam : Cyprien Ravidat & Lisa Fontaine

Game Design & Programmation on the final game : Lisa Fontaine

Art par  Lucas Ambs  &  Louise Fayt
